strIntroduction: Discover the history, beauty and sheer magnitude of one of the most ambitious projects ever undertaken by man. A defining moment in the history of engineering, the Panama Canal revolutionised the sailing world and is still a vital feature in global trade to this day. Led by an expert guide, you will tour the canal’s most important locks, its fascinating museums and exhibitions and finish the tour by taking in some of Panama City’s most inspiring tourist sights.
strTitle: Special Offer: Panama Canal Tour

strIntroduction: Come discover the oldest city on the shores of the Pacific Ocean, on this three hour tour of Panama Viejo and the Old Quarter of Panama City!
strTitle: Discover the City of Panama

strIntroduction: Enjoy a guided visit to Bacardi, the largest rum distillery in the world, in this full day tour. You will also have the opportunity to visit the old walled town of San Juan, one of the best preserved Spanish colonial cities in the world and the second oldest city in the Americas. The tour also includes a visit to the impressive 500 year old Fortress of San Cristobal.
strTitle: Bacardi Distillery and Old San Juan Shopping Tour

strIntroduction: Discover the second city of Puerto Rico with a day trip to captivating Ponce. With its unique architecture, laid-back vibe and colonial history, Ponce offers visitors a chance to discover Puerto Rico past and present. Wander among the splendid neoclassical and art deco buildings, linger in the shady squares and admire the sparkling fountains in this cultural and friendly city.
strTitle: Ponce Architectural City Tour

strIntroduction: Sydney Tower Buffet is the contemporary self-select restaurant in Sydney Tower Dining. Offering an extensive banquet-style dining experience with uninterrupted revolving views of the city, Sydney Tower Buffet provides the perfect relaxed dining environment for locals and visitors alike.

strIntroduction: Wineglass Bay, which located at Freycinet Peninsula in Tasmania, is one of the world's ten best beaches. You must be here to be vibrated by view of white sand, blue seawater and pink granite !

strIntroduction: Discover the beautiful wilderness on Sydney's doorstep on a day trip to the World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains, Featherdale Wildlife Park!

strIntroduction: This is a two-day, one-night trip to Salt Lake. You can enjoy the starry night’s reflection off the Salt Lake. You will visit the small town of Bendigo, known as the Small Golden Mountain. Then you will see Australia's third-largest Church, the Cathedral of the Sacred Heart, and enjoy the Murray River. Next you can view the small town’s plantings with abundant, flowering rapeseed plants. In this journey you will see all the beauty of Australia's dreamscape sites, and enjoy an unforgettable experience of a lifetime!
strTitle: 2-Day Melbourne Salt Lake Tour

strIntroduction: 來到以淘金熱發跡的小鎮 - 疏芬山，彷彿穿越時空回到 1850 年代，完美再現「維多利亞淘金熱」時期的街景、居民與生活風格，讓您以第三人稱的角度置身在這座小鎮。別忘了穿上你最復古、最vintage的服裝，來融入這個古色古香的城鎮吧！
strTitle: Ballarat Sovereign Hill Day Tour

strIntroduction: 前往歷史悠久的美麗小鎮 -- 里奇蒙，看看優雅的歷史建築，拜訪費爾德山國家公園，感受澎湃壯觀的羅素瀑布之美。
strTitle: 【Chinese-speaking tour guide shows you around Richmond】Visit small towns in Richmond, Flinders Chase National Park, and Russell Falls

strIntroduction: Ride hot-air balloon in Gold Coast, appreciate dawning on the horizon, and experience the incredible feeling of floating in mid-air over picturesque fields and view.
strTitle: Welcome the sunrise in mid-air: Hot-air Balloon Ride in Gold Coast (with breakfast and champagne in vineyards)

strIntroduction: 搭乘太陽戀人號前往摩爾礁（外堡礁），搭乘半潛水艇欣賞水面下繽紛的珊瑚和餵魚表演，還能在船上享用美味的自助午餐。豐富又有趣的行程，適合全家大小一同出遊！
strTitle: Breathtaking Tour of the Great Barrier Reef: One-day trip taking the Sun Lover boat ride – a snorkeling and semi-submarine (with lunch buffet) trip

strIntroduction: 歷史悠久的亞瑟港是到塔斯曼尼亞必遊的景點，擁有優美的海岸線與英國村莊美景，風趣的中文導遊將帶您拜訪著名的亞瑟港歷史遺址監獄，以及著名的自然奇景，包含噴水洞、塔斯曼拱門、棋盤道、魔鬼廚房與鷹脖灣。
strTitle: 【Chinese-speaking tour guide shows you around Port Arthur】 Old prison, Tasman Arch, and British village structures

strIntroduction: For visitors traveling to Sydney, this Pass would render your journey to Blue Mountains even more convenient.
strTitle: Blue Mountains Explorer Bus Pass – unlimited access to 29 Attractions

strIntroduction: When you’re planning your trip to Melbourne or the greater Victoria region there is one thing that must be included on your itinerary – the Great Ocean Road tour.
strTitle: Great Ocean Road Day Tour (all inclusive package)

strIntroduction: 來一趟擁有超大腹地的史蒂芬港之旅，乘坐遊船與港灣內的野生海豚近距離接觸、享用遊船午餐，乘坐四驅車體驗沙漠探險與滑沙，參觀澳洲爬蟲動物公園與知名葡萄酒莊，豐富的內容讓您度過充實的一天！
strTitle: 【Port Stephens Day Trip】Dolphin Cruise & Buggy Desert Adventure

strIntroduction: 一起在遊艇上欣賞耀眼的雪梨港吧！在這趟雪梨城市一日遊，您能夠悠閒漫步在風景如畫的達令港，乘船遊海港並享用自助午餐，參觀雪梨水族館和野生動物園，遊覽邦迪海灘和雪梨歌劇院，以及歷史悠久的岩石區。
strTitle: 【Sydney Day Trip】Darling Harbour, Opera House, Sydney Harbour Bridge

strIntroduction: 風趣的中文導遊帶領您遊覽坎培拉市區，參觀新國會大廈、戰爭紀念館，為您解說這些地方背後的歷史與時代故事。拜訪維妙維肖的縮小世界--卡金頓小人國公園小人國，精緻可愛的模型讓人彷彿進入夢幻的童話世界。
strTitle: 【Magical World of Lilliputians】Day trip to Cockington Green Gardensand Downtown Canberra (with Chinese-speaking tour guide)

strIntroduction: Grand Pacific Drive is one of the world's most beautiful highways and the best route from Sydney to Wollongong. On the way to the southern Gulf, the road has a plethora of beautiful scenery like small fishing villages, farmland, rural landscapes, not to mention boundless views of the sea. After arriving in Jervis Bay, you will board a boat with KKday and gracefully dance with the dolphins.
strTitle: "One of the world's most beautiful highways" Grand Pacific Drive's and Jervis Bay Dolphin day tour

strIntroduction: 藍山國家公園是世界文化遺產之一，在這片廣大的野生大地上，您能夠欣賞得天獨厚的遼闊自然美景，搭乘藍山纜車俯瞰大地，看看野生動物園裡可愛的無尾熊與袋鼠，最後拜訪溫特沃斯瀑布、三姐妹峰及珍羅蘭鐘乳石洞。
strTitle: Blue Mountain Day Tour (Chinese Guide)

strIntroduction: 從雪梨港出發，搭乘遊船欣賞沿岸美景，接著出海觀賞鯨魚由南極北上的壯觀奇景！
strTitle: Sydney Harbour Whale Watching Cruise

strIntroduction: 雪梨塔超值三合一套票，讓你登上雪梨塔觀景台一覽雪梨市 360 度全景，在空中走廊上感受兩百多米高空的感官震撼，並來到雪梨塔內的自助餐廳用餐，為你帶來味覺與視覺的雙重享受。
strTitle: Sydney Tower Tickets with Skywalk & Lunch Buffet

strIntroduction: 2012 年於雪梨開幕的杜莎夫人蠟像館，有七十多個栩栩如生的名人蠟像，彷彿那些名人就站在眼前與你對望！
strTitle: Madame Tussauds Sydney Tickets

strIntroduction: 冬春季限定！專業嚮導帶你出海尋找溫柔的海中巨人－座頭鯨！從超人氣賞鯨地點－黃金海岸衝浪者天堂 (Gold Coast Surfers Paradise) 出發，感受巨大的鯨魚從身旁游過、噴氣，甚至躍出水面的奇觀。還等什麼？現在就一起出海吧！
strTitle: 【尋找溫柔的海中巨人】黃金海岸．天堂號賞鯨遊船

strIntroduction: 到雪梨或邦代海灘（Bondi Beach）自由行必備的觀光巴士車票！1 或 2 日的不限站點上下車，讓你的旅程更加便利！
strTitle: Sydney & Bondi Explorer Bus Pass

strIntroduction: 搭乘世界上保存最良好的古董蒸汽火車帕芬比利，帶您穿梭在雨林之間，欣賞大自然美景。抵達希爾斯維爾野生動物保護區後，可和澳洲各式各樣的野生動物，包括無尾熊、袋鼠、鴨嘴獸等做近距離接觸。喜愛自然景觀與野生動物的您，絕對不能錯過！
strTitle: Dandenong Ranges Tour by Puffing Billy Steam Train & Healesville Sanctuary

strIntroduction: Take a luxury cruise, tour the Sydney Harbor, enjoy Sydney's major well-known buildings, as well as the beautiful sunsets, and while on the ship, enjoy a delicious dinner！
strTitle: 【Sunset Enjoyment】Sydney Harbor Cruises, including three-course dinner

strIntroduction: On Camira cruise, you will get to see the beautiful Whitehaven Beach in The Whitsundays, and enjoy a soothing and rich vacation on the sea!

strIntroduction: Alice Springs is the door that opens to the beautiful Uluru. This is the place that unfolds the stories of Australia's history and cultural heritage. These stories include camel races, gold miners and the pioneers who broke the ground of the outback.

strIntroduction: You always dreamt of the feeling of riding a wave? You are an absolute beginner or you already tried once but you need a refresher course? This course is the perfect fit for EVERYBODY (12 years and older)!

strIntroduction: What do you plan to do when going to Gold Coast? Watching Sheep Show in Paradise Country, playing exciting rides in Movie World and seeing ocean animals in Sea World must be on your itinerary list!

strIntroduction: 風趣的中文導遊帶您暢遊「澳洲的文化首都」- 墨爾本，走遍弗林德火車站、聖保羅大教堂、亞拉河畔、尤利卡88樓觀景台等等，感受墨爾本的人文歷史風情。
strTitle: "The essence of Melbourne tour" Frind railway station, St Paul's Cathedral, beside the Yarra River
